title: NBFC recovery to bring higher Q4 profits; funding costs to rise, too - Economic Times
content: NBFC recovery to bring higher Q4 profits; funding costs to rise, too  Economic Times
description: Motilal Oswal expects NBFCs under its coverage to report a year-on-year net profit growth of 32% led by Bajaj Finance, Cholamandalam Investment and Finance, L&T Finance and LIC Housing Finance (LICHF). It expects higher credit costs to hurt Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services, which could impact its earnings.=
